aboutme.title: I am ELLI
aboutme.text: Frontend developer specializing in Next.js and Tailwind CSS. I build commercial web products focused on performance and modern UI. Experienced with Three.js, animations, and mobile development.

projects.videocubes: Commercial website for LED video cubes designed for sports arenas. Responsive landing page with custom Tailwind configuration and product showcase.
projects.dicolor: Corporate website for an LED screen manufacturer. Server-rendered with Next.js App Router, product catalog for indoor and outdoor displays.
projects.katafot: Corporate website for an LED displays and road equipment company. Built with Next.js, responsive design with custom fonts and optimized images.
projects.lampro: Full business website for a professional LED equipment manufacturer. Hero carousel, lead capture forms, project portfolio with 1400+ completed projects.
projects.cone: Interactive 3D parametric cone generator. Geometry computed server-side via Next.js API Routes, rendered as wireframe with raw BufferGeometry — no built-in Three.js primitives.
projects.scroll: Apple-style scroll-driven frame-by-frame animation. 24 PNG frames play on canvas via GSAP ScrollTrigger as the user scrolls. Pinned viewport, snap-to-frame.
projects.recipes: Full-featured recipe application with modern UI. Browse, search, and filter recipes using shadcn/ui components and Lucide icons.
projects.lichi: Virtualized product catalog connected to the real Lichi fashion API. Only visible cards are in the DOM via react-window, infinite scroll auto-fetches new pages, SWR caching.
projects.aibag: E-commerce prototype with 36 AI-generated bag images. Zero dependencies — pure vanilla JS. Dark/light theme, order modal, responsive grid, BEM methodology.
